channel.title: New Project on TooNormal
channel.description: Recent content in New Project on TooNormal

item.title: Something new, blue, and not for you
item.description: So, I’ve been dabbling with something new. One of the frustrating conclusions I came to whilst working on “Alone, The” was that content creation was way, far far, too much work. I went in to the project with some strong ideals about procedural content being lifeless and uninteresting. I still somewhat believe that, but when reality kicks in, you realize one can not make a seriously large game alone at a decent pace without being somewhat procedural.
